This is a *cam* version - in which the bottom of the screen is not visible and you miss a lot of what is going on. If you like to listen to people eating popcorn and crumpling candy wrappers then you will love this. Don't waste your time on this.

I can't believe anyone is still downloading this piece of crap. If you want an actual DVD rip which is of excellent quality and around 700Mb in size, go here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3560151/Ice_Age_2__The_Meltdown_(2006)_[DVDRip.XviD]

You will be glad you did.
